trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Victoria
There were no other sightings in Victoria on or around August 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswe were at my girlfriends, friends wedding , as day grew into night i always had a facination with the night sky i have watched comets eclipses ,satellites and what not and i really love looking up to see what i can . so i had a beer or two and went to have a smoke in the pit an as always i was looking up at the sky nothing unusual at first but i kept smoking my cigarette and kept looking up i had seen what looked like a star moving from direct north to direct south it went though the sky for about 400 miles or so in about 30 seconds when it turned from white yellow to red and vanished not a minute later the same thing happened to the left in the sky about 00 miles over and did the same exact thing i asked other people there on their in put and they had said they had never seen anything like it before and i had never either i tried to explain it away but aircraft we have don't fly that fast and silent ,i wish i would have took a picture but i never made it that far i was way to mezmorized i hope i get to experience something like that again and have a cam because i will than have proof and post the evidence ....always looking up hope to have some more proof
